content.text:
# 2015 President's Cup (tennis) – Men's singles__disambig_1

Mikhail Kukushkin
| runner =  Evgeny Donskoy
| score  = 6–2, 6–2
}}
Ričardas Berankis was the defending champion but chose to play in the Atlanta Open instead.
Mikhail Kukushkin won the tournament, defeating Evgeny Donskoy in the final.
Seeds
Mikhail Kukushkin (champion)
#  Konstantin Kravchuk (semifinals)
#  Evgeny Donskoy (final)
#  Karen Khachanov (second round)
#  Yannick Mertens (quarterfinals)
#  Hiroki Moriya (second round)
#  Connor Smith (first round)
#  Chen Ti (quarterfinals)
}}
